{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"そのため、","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":true,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"HTML, CSSのファイルを編集→ブラウザでHTML, CSSで作られたページを確認 ","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"という作業が頻繁に発生します。\n本来であれば、編集→保存→エクスプローラでHTMLファイルを開く→変更部分を確認→また編集・・・とかなり面倒な作業となります。\nそれを解決するのが","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":true,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"blue"},"plain_text":"Live Preview","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"というVSCodeの","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":true,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"拡張機能","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"です。","href":null}]}

{"color":"gray_background","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"[雑談] ","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":true,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":" HTMLはプログラミング言語？","href":null}]}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"よくネット上の「初心者おすすめプログラミング言語○選！」みたいな記事では、HTMLやCSSがプログラミング言語の一種のように語られます。しかし、実はHTMLもCSSもプログラミング言語ではありません。","href":null}]}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"ですが、HTMLもCSSもプログラミング言語とは違う括りの","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":true,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"言語","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"に属します。","href":null}]}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"HTMLはその正式名称","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":true,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"HyperText Markup ","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":true,"strikethrough":false,"underline":true,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"Language","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"にLanguageという言葉が含まれています。HTMLは、","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"マークアップ言語","href":"https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E3%83%9E%E3%83%BC%E3%82%AF%E3%82%A2%E3%83%83%E3%83%97%E8%A8%80%E8%AA%9E"},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"という言語の一種です。","href":null}]}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"CSSに関しては正式名称","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":true,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"Cascading Style Sheets","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"にLanguageという言葉こそ含まれていませんが、これは","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"スタイルシート言語","href":"https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E3%82%B9%E3%82%BF%E3%82%A4%E3%83%AB%E3%82%B7%E3%83%BC%E3%83%88#%E3%82%B9%E3%82%BF%E3%82%A4%E3%83%AB%E3%82%B7%E3%83%BC%E3%83%88%E8%A8%80%E8%AA%9E"},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"の一種なのです。","href":null}]}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"ジャンルこそ違えど、HTMLもCSSも立派な「","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":true,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"言語","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"」なのです。","href":null}]}

{"language":"html","parent":[" てすとぉ！

これはテストページです

つれづれなるまゝに、日くらし、硯にむかひて、心に移りゆくよしなし事を、
そこはかとなく書きつくれば、あやしうこそものぐるほしけれ
